sentences: See on viis kilomeetri pikkune tee.
Kaugus linnast metsani on k√ºmme kilomeetrit.
context: The word 'kilomeetrit' is the partitive case form of 'kilomeeter' (kilometer) in Estonian. It means 'kilometers' and is used when referring to an unspecified or indefinite quantity of kilometers, or when the number is in the nominative plural form. In English, it directly translates to 'kilometers'.
